1.content: First of all who shrinks?
1.title: The start

11.content: Next by whom will you end up with?
11.title: You!

111.content:
It was a normal summer day in your village. Nothing ordinary happened for most of the day. Later in the afternoon you started to feel like if someone followed you. The feeling didnt stop till you went to bed. The next day you woke up by the loud laughter of what seemed to be a boy. Suddenly you start to fall as the light blinded you for a moment. After you got your vision again you saw a gigantic boy sitting next to you. His leather boots were as high as skyscraper to you and his face as big as the moon.

"Finally a new toy. I was getting bloddy bored" alois spoke with his thundering voice before lifting you up with his two fingers.
"But he is so small i could just swollow you whole in my gigantic mouth" he said as he opened his mouth as you saw his tattoo on his tongue "but it would be too easy" he continued and close his mouth again. You are scared for your lofe as he treated you like you were worth less than nothing

"I think we will.."
111.title: Alois

choices: You Make a Run For It!
Alois Peels His Stockings Off and Shows His Stinky Bare Feet
1111.content:
Grinning devilishly, Alois looked down at his brown knee high boots. Wiggling his toes within them, he felt the squishy fabric of his stockings adorning his young feet.

Letting out a devious giggle, Alois Trancy roughly tossed you to the carpet. You hit the floor hard and were surprised nothing was broken. "P-please, who are you?! Where am I?!" You demand.

Alois just gives you a smug look and slams his boot down inches from you. "You're too pitiful to be demanding answers from me! But I'll fill you in just because I'm so nice and all."

The blonde boy reached down to his left boot and began to tug at it. "Grrgh...you are at the Trancy estate. I am called Alois Trancy, but YOU will call me 'master' or 'king'!"

The giant lad struggled with the thoroughly glued on footwear until...

POP!

The boot came unstuck from Alois' black stocking and it was slowly eased down his leg. "Ahh~...the air feels good." Alois exaggeratedly moaned.

The steam emitting from the discarded boot terrified you, but it was nothing compared to the awful stench the giant black stocking foot was emitting.

Speaking of which, the other boot was thrown down next to you. And Alois then began to slowly and seductively peel his stockings off.
1111.title: Start in my filthy boots!

choices: Putting you inside if his boot
11112.content:
You were like paralized and looked at the lad in fear as he was slowly taking off his stocking. As alois was taking his stocking off he said " soon you will meet your new workplace as an official foot servant of your master alois trancy" he smirked as he completely taken off his stocking. He threw the stocking inches behind you blocking any way of you to escape as you were surrounded by his footwear.

Alois stretched his foot right infront of you as you hold your nose in utter disgust. Im comparison to you was alois foot a skyscraper. The pure sweat odor that came from his foot was overpowering everything around you.

"This is your duty from now on. You will be in charge of cleaning my feet and footwear. No matter if i wear boots, normal shoes or just socks after i worn them your duty is to clean it. Understood?" Alois said in a downgrading tone.

"Y...y..yes alois" you nervously said.
Alois face changed from playful to angry. He pushes his still sweaty foot right on your torso

"I said you must call me master or king and you already failed! For that you will be punished in form of..."
